flawed_nl_solution:
Charles drew 6 + 6 = <<6+6=8>>8 pictures.
He has 20 - 8 = <<20-8=12>>12 papers left.
So Charles drew when he came back from work 12 - 2 = <<12-2=10>>10 pictures.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
